s228: Fifth. Captured Qin general Wang Li.
s229: Fourteenth. Zhang Er was angry at Chen Yu, abandoned his general's seal and left.
s238: Sixth. Attacked and broke Zhang Han, Zhang Han's army retreated.
s241: Nineteenth. Obtained Peng Yue's army at Changyi, attacked Chenliu. Using Li Yiji's strategy, army obtained accumulated grain.
s251: Twentieth. Attacked Kaifeng, defeated Qin general Yang Xiong, Xiong fled to Xingyang, Qin executed Xiong to display.
s258: Eighth. Chu urgently attacked Zhang Han, Zhang Han was afraid, sent chief clerk Xin back to Qin to request troops, Zhao Gao obstructed him.
s261: Twenty-first. Attacked Yingyang, raided Han territory, north cut off the river crossing.
s268: Ninth. Zhao Gao wanted to execute Xin, Xin was afraid, fled, informed Zhang Han of plotting rebellion against Qin.
s278: Tenth. Zhang Han agreed to surrender to Chu, not yet decided, Xiang Yu promised and then attacked him.
